cps.description: TripManager is responsible for creating strategic route between starting location and destination location.
cps.name: TripManager

Message.description: All vehicle sensor data along with third-party data.
Message.name: Injections

Message.description: Vehicle Mass/Type, start and destination point, road infrastructure etc.
Message.name: InitialData

Message.description: Current location and time of the vehicle.
Message.name: TimeLocCommSignal

Message.description: Difference of data(initial data) at each cycle.
Message.name: DataRevisions

cps.description: TripPlanner recieves the initial data, and based on previous experience (transportation model) generate the TripPlan.
cps.name: TripPlanner

Message.description: Previous Plan based on training data and model on that strategic route.
Message.name: TripPlan

cps.description: OEDRC is responsible for oject and event detection and recognition/classfication.
cps.name: OEDRC

Message.description: Different scenarios that show up during a driving segment, which comprises of triplan, obstacle detection, weather, road condition, road type, transportation and infrastructure etc.
Message.name: EnvironmentScenario

cps.description: Response is responsible for generating torque request for the vehicle to acheive safe and desired goal.
cps.name: Response

Message.description: Torque request for simulated TripPlan provided by TripPlan and influenced by EnvironmentScenario provided by the OEDRC.
Message.name: TorqueRequestsOp

cps.description: Monitor is responsible for monitoring all the automated driving related data.
cps.name: Monitor

Message.description: Revision of OES-A at each cycle.
Message.name: OES-A-Revision

Message.description: Revision of OES-N at each cycle.
Message.name: OES-N-Revision

Message.description: Deviation from the previous scenario.
Message.name: ScenarioFeedback

Message.description: Fallback mode to trigger fail safe situation occurs(flat tire, sudden appearance of an obstacle).
Message.name: FailSafeOpSignal

Message.description: Identifies deviation from Dynamic Driving Task performance.
Message.name: DDTPerformanceDeviationData

cps.description: FailOpSafe is responsible for gnerating torque request for the vehicle to acheive safe fallback operation.
cps.name: FailOpSafe

Message.description: Torque request for simulated TripPlan provided by TripPlan and influenced by EnvironmentScenario provided by the OEDRC during fallback scenario.
Message.name: TorqueRequestsOv

cps.description: OESNominal identifies the optimal conditions under which the vehicle can operate safely.
cps.name: OESNominal

Message.description: Safe conditions under which the vehicle can operate reliabily.
Message.name: OES-N

cps.description: OESActual identifies the actual conditions under which the vehicle currently operates.
cps.name: OESActual

Message.description: Actual conditions under which the vehicle currently operates.
Message.name: OES-A

cps.description: Sensors are responsible for sensing the in-vehicle and out-vehicle drivability events.
cps.name: Sensors

Message.description: Actual Vehicle data (tire pressure, friction, etc), and Braking Pattern.
Message.name: SensorData

Message.description: Status of the vehicle sensors.
Message.name: SensorStatus

cps.description: Communications is responsible for data exchange among CPS (vehicle) components via vehicle bus, as well as inbound third-party data via WIFI.
cps.name: Communications

Message.description: V2V and V2I data.
Message.name: Real-timeCommsData

Message.description: Communication sender/receiver status.
Message.name: CommsStatus

cps.description: VehiclePhysicsEng is responsible for maneuvering process based on torque and steering request.
cps.name: VehiclePhysicsEng

Message.description: Current state of vehicle components (ECUs).
Message.name: VehiclePhysState

cps.description: TimingLocation is responsible for sending and recieving current vehicle location and zone.
cps.name: TimingLocation

Message.description: Vehicle simulation time.
Message.name: TimeLoc

message.description: This is a message template for general stream messaging on the Ethernet network
message.name: streammessage

Property.statement: ADS messaging shall use JSON for payloads
The control message shall protect privacy
The Relay control message shall be secure
Transport layer messages from the ADS components shall be available and authentic
